item.title: Close the loops
item.description:
Summary

A short course taught at the Department of Government at the University of Texas at Austin. GitHub Repo includes handout and links of suggested readings (and viewings) on time management, creativity, and best practices. I emphasized the iterative nature of writing, stressing the need to manage the shallow work of email, meetings, and the like so that one can focus un-distracted on the Deep Work of writing, coding, and problem solving.

item.title: The flag and the cross
item.description:
Summary

A dissertation proposal investigating the role of religion in American grand strategy. Religion has recently garnered increased and consistent attention from international relations scholars. Yet, the subject matter remains both under theorized and more work help us better understand how actors previously overlook, but nevertheless significant, can influence American foreign policymaking.
